# Vouchy Launchpad

> The all-in-one platform for collecting, managing, and showcasing video and text testimonials.

## Project Overview
Vouchy Launchpad helps businesses build trust by easily collecting authentic user testimonials.
- **Core Features**: Video recording, text reviews, AI-assisted polishing, customizable showcase widgets.
- **Target Audience**: SaaS founders, agencies, creators.

## Key Routes for Context
- `/`: Landing page. Overview of features and value prop.
- `/auth`: User authentication (Login/Signup).
- `/collect/{slug}`: Public-facing collection page where end-users submit testimonials.
- `/embed/{workspaceId}`: Embeddable widget view for external sites.

## Integration & API
- **Embeds**: Widgets are embedded via iframe using the `/embed/{workspaceId}` route.
- **Data Model**:
  - `Space`: A collection bucket for testimonials (has `slug`, `questions`, settings).
  - `Testimonial`: The submitted content (video URL, text, rating, author info).

## Technical Stack
- Frontend: React, Vite, Tailwind CSS, Framer Motion.
- Backend/DB: Supabase (PostgreSQL, Auth, Storage).
- AI Features: Google Gemini (for text enhancement and analysis).
